com.bigdata.ganglia

Class RichMetricMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.ganglia.AbstractGangliaMessage
      • com.bigdata.ganglia.GangliaMetricMessage
        • com.bigdata.ganglia.RichMetricMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGangliaMessage, IGangliaMetricMessage

    public class RichMetricMessage
extends GangliaMetricMessage
    Class bundles together an IGangliaMetricMessage with the IGangliaMetadataMessage which provides its declaration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RichMetricMessage(String hostName, IGangliaMetadataMessage decl, boolean spoof, String format, Object value)
      Constructor produces an IGangliaMetricMessage which is consistent with the IGangliaMetadataMessage.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IGangliaMetadataMessage getMetadata()
      The declaration and never null.

      • Methods inherited from class com.bigdata.ganglia.GangliaMetricMessage

        equals, getFormat, getNumericValue, getStringValue, getValue, hashCode, isMetricMetadata, isMetricRequest, isMetricValue, isNumeric, toString

      • Methods inherited from class com.bigdata.ganglia.AbstractGangliaMessage

        getHostName, getMetricName, getRecordType, isSpoof

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bigdata.ganglia.IGangliaMessage

        getHostName, getMetricName, getRecordType, isSpoof

    • Constructor Detail

      • RichMetricMessage

        public RichMetricMessage(String hostName,
                 IGangliaMetadataMessage decl,
                 boolean spoof,
                 String format,
                 Object value)
        Constructor produces an IGangliaMetricMessage which is consistent with the IGangliaMetadataMessage.
        Parameters:
        hostName - The host reporting this metric value (should be ip:host if this is a spoof record).
        decl - The metric declaration.
        spoof - if this is a spoof record.
        format - The printf format to be used.
        value - The value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the hostName is null.
        NullPointerException - if the declaration is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the format is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the value is null.

    • Method Detail

      • getMetadata

        public IGangliaMetadataMessage getMetadata()
        The declaration and never null.
